name: Magic Of Betrayal 1
description:
A prequel RPG to a 3 part series including this, A land controlled by 8 elements, Earth, fire, wind, water, Ice, Thunder, Light and Dark, MC is the son of a matriarch, along with his sister he must save the country, but his country isnt as good as he thought....

random loot from monsters, quest based with a free field thats a bit primitive in design, hopefully 2 is better
